headline: CarMax, Inc. (KMX): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on CarMax, Inc. on Stock Region Research’s Substack by Stock Region. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on KMX. CarMax, Inc.’s share was trading at $66.67 as of June 26th. KMX’s trailing and forward P/E ratios were 18.42 and 17.57, respectively, according to Yahoo Finance. CarMax delivered a […]
